explanation: The issue was in the way the program updated the `dp` matrix when transitioning through vertex `x`. The original line was not properly keeping track of the odd/even transitions in the count of occurrences of `x`. The fix was inspired by understanding the need to keep the transitions consistent with the requirement that `X` appears an even number of times. Specifically, the line responsible for updating `dp` when transitioning through `x` should also consider both its even and odd counts. This is reflected in how I adjusted the transition logic for the case when `v == x-1` to ensure proper tracking of even occurrences across possible paths.
